Installation
============

Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

HELP depends on the following packages:

* numpy

* pandas

* typing

* matplotlib

* skimage

* sklearn

* tqdm

* lightgbm

* tabulate

* networkx

* karateclub

* ipywidgets

* supervenn


Pip
~~~

HELP allows pip-based installation, please use the following
command:

.. code:: shell

   pip install git+https://github.com/giordamaug/HELP.git
